headline: Buongiorno, Milano! CloudFlare’s 26th Data Center Now Live
keywords: Cloudflare Network, Data Center, Italy, Europe
description: Italy is known for many great things. First and foremost, the Azzurri—2006 World Cup champions and (as of yesterday) dashers of England's world cup hopes—but also the Colosseum, the fountains of Florence, the canals of Venice, the Alps, and more.
